name: activepieces
description: Activepieces is an open-source, no-code workflow automation platform that lets teams build automations and AI workflows with drag-and-drop logic. Users can self-host or use the cloud version, and integrate with 400+ apps to automate business workflows.
features: No-Code Automation: Build powerful workflows with visual drag-and-drop tools. No programming required.
400+ Integrations: Connect popular apps to streamline business processes. Everything works together.
AI-Powered: Create intelligent, adaptive workflows with AI capabilities. Automation that thinks.
Flexible Hosting: Choose self-hosting for control or cloud for convenience. Deploy your way.
Visual Designer: Design complex workflows through intuitive visual interface. See your logic flow.
Custom Actions: Create tailored triggers and actions for specific needs. Unlimited possibilities.
Team Collaboration: Multiple members can build and manage workflows together. Shared productivity.
Open Source: Extend functionality with community contributions and custom code. Truly flexible platform.
